text: Goytre (Welsh: Goetre) is a village in the community of Goetre Fawr in Monmouthshire, south east Wales. The population of the whole of Goetre Fawr, including Goytre, was 2,393 in 2011. == Location == Goytre is five miles south of Abergavenny and four miles north of Pontypool, Torfaen. == References == Category:Villages in Monmouthshire
title: Goytre, Monmouthshire
